title: Flat Tire
description: The lead truck hits a sharp rock. Hissing air signals another flat.

options.label: Change it yourself (2 hours)
options.outcome: The crew changes the tire in the rain. Back on the road, but behind schedule.

options.label: Use the spare and continue
options.outcome: Quick swap and you're moving again. Hope there are no more surprises.

options.label: Wait for help
options.outcome: Another crew passes by and helps. Cost you half a day.

title: Engine Trouble
description: The skidder coughs and sputters. Smoke rises from the engine compartment.

options.label: Field repair with spare parts
options.outcome: Your mechanic works through the problem. Fixed, but parts are depleted.

options.label: Limp to the next block slowly
options.outcome: Running on half power, you make it to a spot where proper repairs are possible.

options.label: Call for tow truck ($500)
options.outcome: The machine gets hauled out. Expensive, but the right choice.

title: Chainsaw Breakdown
description: The primary saw throws its chain into a stump. Something's bent.

options.label: Swap to backup saw
options.outcome: The backup saw is slower but works. Production drops for the day.

options.label: Send runner for parts
options.outcome: Someone drives to town. Lost time but the good saw runs again.

options.label: Try to straighten the bar
options.outcome: With patience and a hammer, it's serviceable. Probably.

title: Truck Stuck in Mud
description: The truck sinks to its axles in soft ground. It's not going anywhere without help.

options.label: Winch it out with the skidder
options.outcome: Slow work, but eventually free. Equipment takes a beating.

options.label: Dig and lay brush road
options.outcome: Everyone grabs shovels. Exhausting work but it works.

options.label: Leave it and walk out
options.outcome: You hike back with essential gear. The truck waits for drier weather.

title: Sudden Storm
description: Dark clouds roll in fast. Lightning flashes over the ridge.

options.label: Take shelter immediately
options.outcome: Everyone piles into vehicles. Safe but no work gets done.

options.label: Push through to the next block
options.outcome: You race the storm. Most make it, but conditions are dangerous.

options.label: Set up emergency camp
options.outcome: Tarps go up fast. You wait out the worst. Morale holds.

title: Flash Flood Warning
description: The creek you crossed this morning is now a torrent. Water's rising fast.

options.label: Move to high ground immediately
options.outcome: Everyone scrambles uphill. Equipment is safe but the day is lost.

options.label: Risk crossing now before it gets worse
options.outcome: A gamble. The trucks make it across, barely.

options.label: Camp on this side overnight
options.outcome: You wait for waters to drop. Lost a day but everyone's dry.

title: Extreme Cold Snap
description: Temperature drops to -30C overnight. Everything is frozen solid.

options.label: Keep vehicles running all night
options.outcome: Engines stay warm but fuel tanks drain fast.

options.label: Bundle up and wait it out
options.outcome: Everyone huddles in camp. A few frostbite scares but manageable.

options.label: Light a big warming fire
options.outcome: The fire keeps spirits high. Extra food consumed for energy.

title: Bear in Camp
description: A black bear has found the food cache. It's not happy about being interrupted.

options.label: Make noise and back away slowly
options.outcome: The bear eventually wanders off. Some food is ruined.

options.label: Use bear spray
options.outcome: Direct hit. The bear runs. Everyone's shaken but safe.

options.label: Fire a warning shot
options.outcome: The blast startles the bear into the bush. Compliance might ask questions.

title: Grizzly Territory
description: Fresh grizzly signs everywhere. Tracks, scat, claw marks on trees. This is her home.

options.label: Post bear watch and continue
options.outcome: Work continues with nervous glances. Productivity suffers.

options.label: Relocate operations for the day
options.outcome: You move to a different area. Safe but inefficient.

options.label: Report and request guidance
options.outcome: Wildlife officers advise caution. A two-day delay while they assess.

title: Moose on the Road
description: A bull moose stands in the middle of the road. He's not moving.

options.label: Wait him out
options.outcome: After 20 minutes of staring, he finally ambles off.

options.label: Honk and inch forward
options.outcome: The moose charges the truck! Minor dents but everyone's okay.

options.label: Find an alternate route
options.outcome: A longer path but no wildlife confrontation.

title: Caribou Herd Crossing
description: A herd of caribou is crossing ahead. Dozens of them, taking their time.

options.label: Stop and watch respectfully
options.outcome: Beautiful sight. The crew takes photos. Good for morale.

options.label: Radio ahead about the delay
options.outcome: Office appreciates the update. Lost an hour.

options.label: Try to pass slowly
options.outcome: The herd scatters. You save time but feel bad about it.

title: Worker Injury
description: A crew member slips on a log and goes down hard, clutching their ankle.

options.label: Apply first aid and continue
options.outcome: Bandaged up and back to light duty. They'll be sore for days.

options.label: Send them out for medical care
options.outcome: One truck heads to town. You're short-handed but it's the right call.

options.label: Have them rest in camp
options.outcome: They stay behind to heal. Might be fine tomorrow.

title: Bad Food
description: Half the crew woke up sick. Something in last night's dinner didn't agree.

options.label: Rest day for the sick
options.outcome: Those affected stay in camp. Work continues short-handed.

options.label: Push through anyway
options.outcome: Everyone works but productivity tanks. Some near-miss incidents.

options.label: Dispose of suspect food
options.outcome: You throw out everything questionable. Food stores depleted.

title: Chainsaw Accident
description: A saw kicks back. There's blood. This is serious.

options.label: Emergency first aid
options.outcome: The first aid kit gets heavy use. Bleeding stopped. Needs hospital.

options.label: Call helicopter medevac
options.outcome: Air ambulance arrives within the hour. They'll be okay. Expensive.

options.label: Drive to hospital (4 hours)
options.outcome: Someone drives fast. They make it. The crew is shaken.

title: Road Washed Out
description: The road ahead has collapsed into the creek. No way through.

options.label: Build a bypass
options.outcome: With shovels and chainsaws, you cut a rough detour. Takes all day.

options.label: Report and wait for road crew
options.outcome: A proper crew will fix it in 2 days. You're stuck here.

options.label: Try to ford the creek
options.outcome: A risky crossing. The truck makes it but scrapes bottom badly.

title: Questionable Bridge
description: The log bridge ahead looks... tired. Uncertain if it will hold the truck.

options.label: Test it on foot first
options.outcome: You walk across. It holds. Trucks go one at a time, very slowly.

options.label: Reinforce with fresh logs
options.outcome: An hour of cutting and the bridge is solid. Good work.

options.label: Find another crossing
options.outcome: A longer route around. Burns fuel but no bridge worries.

title: Landslide Debris
description: A slope has let go across the road. Trees, mud, and rock block the path.

options.label: Clear it with equipment
options.outcome: The skidder pushes debris aside. Hard on the machine.

options.label: Hand-clear a path
options.outcome: Everyone grabs tools. Exhausting but it works.

options.label: Turn back and report
options.outcome: Safety first. The office will coordinate geotechnical review.

title: Passing Supply Truck
description: Another crew's supply truck is passing through. They've got extras.

options.label: Trade for fuel
options.outcome: You swap some food for fuel. Fair trade.

options.label: Trade for food
options.outcome: Fresh supplies for the camp. Morale rises.

options.label: Just share news
options.outcome: Good conversation and road updates. Nothing more.

title: Supplies Lost
description: A load shifted on the rough road. A box of supplies bounced off somewhere.

options.label: Go back and search
options.outcome: Found most of it scattered along the road. Lost time.

options.label: Write it off and continue
options.outcome: Can't spare the time. That food is gone.

options.label: Secure remaining cargo
options.outcome: You stop to re-tie everything. No more losses.

title: Excellent Road Conditions
description: The road ahead is in great shape - recently graded and smooth.

options.label: Make up time!
options.outcome: The crew pushes forward quickly on the good road. Great progress!

options.label: Take it easy, save fuel
options.outcome: You cruise at low RPMs. Fuel gauge barely moves.

title: Abandoned Supply Cache
description: You spot an old camp with some leftover supplies. Looks usable.

options.label: Scavenge fuel and parts
options.outcome: A few jerry cans of diesel and some spare belts. Score!

options.label: Grab the food supplies
options.outcome: Canned goods and dried rations. Still good!

options.label: Take the first aid kit
options.outcome: A dusty but complete first aid kit. Could be a lifesaver.

title: Beautiful Sunset
description: The evening sky puts on a spectacular show. Everyone stops to watch.

options.label: Take a break and enjoy it
options.outcome: Moments like this remind everyone why they love this work.

options.label: Keep working but appreciate it
options.outcome: Even while busy, the beauty lifts spirits.

title: Helpful Locals
description: Some local First Nations members stop by with advice and coffee.

options.label: Share a meal and listen
options.outcome: They point out a shortcut and warn about a washout ahead.

options.label: Trade for supplies
options.outcome: They have smoked salmon to trade. Delicious and nutritious!

title: Equipment Running Smoothly
description: Everything is humming along perfectly today. Not a single mechanical issue.

options.label: Keep up the momentum
options.outcome: A productive day with no breakdowns. Equipment looks even better.

options.label: Do preventive maintenance
options.outcome: With things running well, you take time to check everything over.
